title: Quantum aspects of Seiberg-Witten map in noncommutative Chern-Simons theory
abstract: Noncommutative Chern-Simons theory can be classically mapped to commutative Chern-Simons theory by the Seiberg-Witten map. We provide evidence that the equivalence persists at the quantum level by computing two and three-point functions of field strengths on the commutative side and their Seiberg-Witten transforms on the noncommutative side to the first nontrivial order in perturbation theory.
